Server Response Time.value: | inputlookup hostperf.csv | eval _time=strptime(_time, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%3Q%z") | timechart span=10m max(rtmax) as responsetime | head 1000
Server Response Time.label: Server Response Time

Employee Logins (prediction errors).value: | inputlookup logins.csv | predict logins as prediction algorithm=LLP future_timespan=150 holdback=0 | where prediction!="" AND logins!="" | eval residual = prediction - logins
Employee Logins (prediction errors).label: Employee Logins (prediction errors)
